Donate

Support us in our mission of helping the public make more informed choices about the software they use in the areas of privacy, convenience, ethics, and more. By donating, you help us create more detailed and accurate charts as well as speed up development for new categories, comparison criteria and services.

When you sponsor the project, we will display your brand on the site's homepage. Organizations with products on our site are prevented from sponsoring us in order to avoid a conflict of interest.

Non-Monetary ways to help

Software Compare takes a lot of effort to maintain and update, so we appreciate any help you can offer!

Some ways to help are:

  • Fact check the site and open a Github issue or pull request so we can ensure accuracy of our information.
  • Join our Matrix , Discord or other socials to help answer questions and interact with the community.
  • If you have any suggestions for the website's design, please reach out and we can discuss further.
